issue.title: [JAVA] Reduce heap usage for variable width vectors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4147](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4147). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a follow up to ARROW-1807. The same changes need to be done for variable len vectors too.

Also, the default value for initial allocations (4096) causes a lot of wastage, and needs to be changed (to 3970).
